situation.title: Musical instruments and singing
situation.meta_description: Playing musical instruments at home is not limited in any way. Singing can be a dangerous activity, as there is a high chance of droplet spread.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Musical instruments

Playing musical instruments at home is not limited in any way. However, we recommend disinfecting the instruments regularly, especially if you are sharing them with other members of the household (cleaning piano keys, etc.). Playing musical instruments anywhere else is limited. Face-to-face teaching is prohibited, as well as concerts or live music at weddings or in restaurants.

Singing

Singing can be a dangerous activity, as there is a high chance of droplet spread. For this reason, group singing of more than five people is forbidden, even if it is an exercise of the profession. An exception applies to kindergartens and your house - so you can sing at home. Church singing is also limited to a maximum of five people (however, the churches are currently closed, so the measure only applies to parishioners and their preparation of a virtual mass).

questions_answers.question: We want to have regular training with our band.
questions_answers.value: Is our frontman allowed to sing? Yes, but the number of singers must not exceed five.
